author: Special Correspondent
text:
A Judicial Magistrate Court here has directed Palayamkottai police to register a case against actor Silambarasan alias Simbu and music director Anirudh for the infamous ‘Beep song’.

Based on the petition filed by advocate Rizwana, Judicial Magistrate I Ramalingam on Monday ordered the police to register a case against Simbu and Anirudh for allegedly making derogatory remarks against women in the ‘Beep song’ that has evoked strong reaction from various quarters, especially on the social media.

In her petition, Ms. Rizwana charged that the controversial song had portrayed women in poor light.
title: Case to be registered against Simbu, Anirudh
